dcterms:description: LIGHT is a collection of text adventure game settings, elements, and in-game dialogues, as well as a functioning text adventure game engine based on a graph state. It includes 100s of locations, over 1000 characters, and over 500k recorded in-game dialogue utterances and interactions.
dcterms:title: LIGHT

dcterms:description: USEEVENTS is a dataset containing multi-object actions and their corresponding narrations and effects on the world, designed to expand the action space beyond the limitations of traditional game engines.
dcterms:title: USEEVENTS

dcterms:creator: Marc-Alexandre Côté
Ákos Kádár

Tavian Barnes
Emery Fine
James Moore

Layla El Asri
Mahmoud Adada
Wendy Tay
Adam Trischler
dcterms:description: TextWorld is a learning environment for text-based games that allows for the development and evaluation of reinforcement learning agents.
dcterms:title: TextWorld

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Ammanabrolu
Mark O. Riedl
dcterms:description: JerichoWorld is a dataset focused on modeling worlds in text, providing a framework for evaluating AI agents in text-based environments.
dcterms:title: JerichoWorld

dcterms:creator: Latitude AI
dcterms:description: AI Dungeon 2 is an interactive text-based adventure game that uses AI to generate narratives based on user input.
dcterms:title: AI Dungeon 2

dcterms:creator: Bill Yuchen Lin
Minghan Shen
Yu Xing
Pei Zhou
Xiang Ren
dcterms:description: CommonGen is a constrained text generation dataset aimed at generative commonsense reasoning, focusing on generating coherent sentences from given concepts.
dcterms:title: CommonGen

dcterms:creator: Rowan Zellers
Yonatan Bisk
Roy Schwartz
Yejin Choi
dcterms:description: SWAG/HellaSWAG is a large-scale adversarial dataset for grounded commonsense inference, designed to evaluate models on their ability to understand context and make inferences.
dcterms:title: SWAG/HellaSWAG

dcterms:creator: Maarten Sap
Ronan Le Bras
Emily Allaway
Chandra Bhagavatula
Nicholas Lourie
Hannah Rashkin
Brendan Roof
Noah A. Smith
Yejin Choi
dcterms:description: ATOMIC is an atlas of machine commonsense for if-then reasoning, providing a structured dataset for understanding causal relationships in everyday scenarios.
dcterms:title: ATOMIC

dcterms:creator: Rowan Zellers
Ari Holtzman
Matthew Peters
Roozbeh Mottaghi
Aniruddha Kembhavi
Ali Farhadi
Yejin Choi
dcterms:description: PIGLeT is a dataset focused on language grounding through neuro-symbolic interaction in a 3D world, designed to evaluate models on their ability to understand and interact with physical environments.
dcterms:title: PIGLeT
